Judul: DENDRITIC CATHODE GROWTH DURING COPPER ELECTROREFINING IN THE PRESENCE OF SOLID PARTICLES
Abstrak:
Series of lab scale electrolysis tests have been made to 

investigate the effects of the presence of various kinds and amounts of solid particles in the electrolyte on the dendrite growth behaviour. Two types of barium sulphate (i.e. Barytmehl N and Blanc Fixe), silica and anode slimes were added to the electrolyte.
Penulis: M. Zaki Mubarok, Iris Filzwieser, Peter Paschen
Kata Kunci: Cathode , Dendritic growth , Buds , Solid particles
